dc_description_s: The Parcel Polygon layer contains polygons depicting the taxable areas of parcels for all of Summit County.To filter your search by Municipality select the table tab and scroll the table to the right until you reach the TaxDistrict column, click on TaxDistrict and it will add a filter. To find out what Tax District Codes are for the municipality you want the Tax District Codes as listed here - http://fiscaloffice.summitoh.net/index.php/component/jdownloads/viewcategory/25. Select the latest year and open the PDF. *Note these are not alphabetical in order but numerical so check the entire PDF to get all Tax District Values for your municipality.*
